name: Funcha
description: We want to combine the system of masternodes with CFD, Crypto trading. 90% of all users lost when trading with CFD. We want to combine the simple system of masternodes and staking coins with the profitable trades of our brokers. I.e. Who has Fucha Coin, profits daily from our trading results by our continuous repurchase of the coins and the burning of at least 50% of these coins.
